block.p: Kate Kristin Keifer, a daughter of Nancy D. Keifer and K. Geoffrey Keifer of Wethersfield, Conn., was married yesterday to William Fox Tracy, a son of Laurette F. Tracy and William X. Tracy III of Bellerose Village, N.Y. Monsignor Robert Emmet Fagan performed the ceremony at the Most Holy Trinity Roman Catholic Church in East Hampton, N.Y.
The couple are buyers in New York for all Lord & Taylor stores. Mrs. Tracy, 29, is the fashion accessories buyer; Mr. Tracy, 27, is the buyer of men's dress shirts and neckwear.
Kate Kristin Keifer and William Fox Tracy were married Saturday at the Most Holy Trinity Roman Catholic Church in East Hampton, N.Y.

Kate Kristin Keifer, a daughter of Nancy D. Keifer and K. Geoffrey Keifer of Wethersfield, Conn., was married yesterday to William Fox Tracy, a son of Laurette F. Tracy and William X. Tracy III of Bellerose Village, N.Y. Monsignor Robert Emmet Fagan performed the ceremony at the Most Holy Trinity Roman Catholic Church in East Hampton, N.Y.
The couple are buyers in New York for all Lord & Taylor stores. Mrs. Tracy, 29, is the fashion accessories buyer; Mr. Tracy, 27, is the buyer of men's dress shirts and neckwear.

The bride graduated from Cornell. Her father works in Assonet, Mass., as the residential sales manager in the New England region for Weyerhaeuser, a company in Federal Way, Wash., that produces home-building materials. Her mother retired as the office manager for an orthodontist in Fredericksburg, Va.

The bridegroom graduated from the College of the Holy Cross. His mother teaches hearing-impaired students at the Henry Viscardi School in Albertson, N.Y. His father is the chief operating officer for Nine West Footwear Corporation in White Plains.
